faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Vaulted Assets

q1.question: What is Vaulted Assets?
q1.answer: Vaulted Assets is a platform that allows you to buy, hold, transfer, and redeem gold- and silver-backed digital tokens. Each token represents direct ownership of fully allocated precious metals stored in secure vaults.

q2.question: How is this different from buying gold or silver physically?
q2.answer: When you buy tokens through Vaulted Assets, you own real gold or silver stored in professional-grade vaults   but you can manage your holdings digitally, trade them instantly, and redeem them anytime.

q3.question: Where are the metals stored?
q3.answer: All gold and silver are stored with approved custodians in high-security vaults located in regulated jurisdictions.

q4.question: Are my holdings insured?
q4.answer: Yes, all vaulted assets are covered by comprehensive insurance policies provided by the custodians.

q5.question: Which blockchains do you use?
q5.answer: Vaulted Assets supports both public blockchains (e.g., Solana, Ethereum) and private/permissioned blockchains (e.g., Canton) to meet different user needs.

q6.question: Can I choose which blockchain my tokens are on?
q6.answer: Yes   you can select your preferred network when purchasing or transferring tokens.

q7.question: Are blockchain transactions reversible?
q7.answer: No. Once a blockchain transaction is confirmed, it cannot be undone. Always double-check transaction details before confirming.

q8.question: How can I buy tokens?
q8.answer: You can purchase tokens using supported fiat currencies or cryptocurrencies directly through our web or mobile app.

q9.question: Can I redeem my tokens for physical gold or silver?
q9.answer: Yes. You can request redemption in the form of physical metals (subject to minimum amounts) or equivalent fiat value.

q10.question: How long does redemption take?
q10.answer: Delivery timelines depend on your location, availability, and the selected method (physical delivery or cash settlement).

q11.question: What fees apply?
q11.answer: We charge fees for transactions, storage, and blockchain transfers. Fees vary depending on whether you use a public or private blockchain.

q12.question: Are transfers between Vaulted Assets users free?
q12.answer: Transfers on private blockchains may have reduced or zero fees. Transfers on public blockchains may incur network gas fees.

q13.question: How is my account secured?
q13.answer: We use strong encryption, two-factor authentication (2FA), and multiple security layers for both wallets and platform access.

q14.question: Do I need to verify my identity?
q14.answer: Yes   all users must complete AML/KYC verification to comply with global regulations.

q15.question: What happens if Vaulted Assets shuts down?
q15.answer: Your metals remain your property. In the event of platform closure, you will be able to redeem your holdings or transfer them to an alternative custodian.

q16.question: Can I move my tokens between Ethereum, Solana, and Canton?
q16.answer: Yes. We support cross-chain transfers through trusted bridges and in some cases via separate issuance models (where a token can be redeemed on one chain and reissued on another). Our documentation explains the specific process for GLD and SLV.

q17.question: Will bridging affect my ownership of the tokens?
q17.answer: No. Whether you hold GLD on Ethereum or Solana, each token is fully backed 1:1 by physical reserves in our vaults.

q18.question: How do I know tokens are fully backed by gold and silver reserves?
q18.answer: Vaulted Assets maintains Proof-of-Reserves with regular third-party audits. We also publish a live dashboard showing token supply against audited vault holdings, so users can verify backing at any time.

q19.question: Who conducts the audits?
q19.answer: Independent, accredited auditing firms conduct our reserve verifications to ensure transparency and trust.

q20.question: Do I need a crypto wallet to use Vaulted Assets?
q20.answer: Not necessarily. Our hybrid wallet system allows you to choose between: Custodial wallets (simple, Web2-style login, no technical knowledge needed). Self-custody wallets (e.g., MetaMask, Phantom, or Canton-compatible solutions).

q21.question: Can I use my existing wallet?
q21.answer: Yes, you can connect your own Web3 wallet to manage your GLD and SLV tokens if you prefer self-custody.

q22.question: Can I gift tokens to someone else?
q22.answer: Yes. Our platform enables token gifting, so you can send gold or silver to family and friends directly.

q23.question: Do you offer referral incentives?
q23.answer: Yes. Vaulted Assets runs referral programs where existing users can invite others and earn rewards in tokens. Details are available in your account dashboard.

q24.question: Can I use Vaulted Assets in my country?
q24.answer: Our services are subject to local laws and regulations. Some jurisdictions may restrict or prohibit participation in digital asset platforms. Please review our Terms of Use and consult your local regulations before investing.

q25.question: Is the platform available to U.S. or EU users?
q25.answer: Availability varies by product. Certain features may be restricted based on compliance requirements. We will notify users during onboarding if access is limited.

introduction.text1: Vaulted Assets ("we," "our," or "us") uses cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, analyze platform usage, and provide tailored content and services. This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and your choices regarding their use.
introduction.text2: By using the Vaulted Assets platform, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this policy.

section1.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
section1.intro: Cookies are small text files placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website or use an application. They allow us to recognize your device, store preferences, and enhance your browsing experience.

session.title: Session Cookies
session.description: Temporary cookies deleted when you close your browser.

persistent.title: Persistent Cookies
persistent.description: Stored on your device for a set period until deleted.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.description: Set by third-party service providers for analytics, advertising, or security purposes.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Cookies
section2.intro: Vaulted Assets uses cookies for the following purposes:

essential.title: 1. Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for the platform to function properly (e.g., logging in, managing token purchases, enabling secure transactions).

performance.title: 2. Performance & Analytics Cookies
performance.description: Help us understand how users interact with the platform, track usage trends, and improve user experience.
performance.example: Example: Monitoring how often users check their real-time gold/silver portfolio.

functionality.title: 3. Functionality Cookies
functionality.description: Store user preferences such as language, currency display (gold in USD/grams), and login session details.

security.title: 4. Security Cookies
security.description: Detect and prevent fraudulent activity, protect accounts, and secure transactions on both private and public blockchains.

marketing.title: 5. Marketing & Personalization Cookies
marketing.description: Deliver relevant content, such as promotions for reduced blockchain transfer fees or loyalty programs.

section3.title: 3. Third-Party Cookies
section3.intro: We may use third-party services that place cookies on your device to provide:

services.analytics: Analytics (e.g., Google Analytics, blockchain transaction monitoring tools)
services.advertising: Advertising (e.g., retargeting based on previous visits to Vaulted Assets)
services.blockchain: Blockchain Network Interactions (e.g., Solana or Ethereum explorers)

section3.note: These third parties may collect information about your browsing habits across different websites.

section4.title: 4. Managing Cookies
section4.intro: You can control and manage cookies in your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to:

actions.view: View cookies stored on your device

section5.title: 5. Retention Periods for Cookies

session.title: Session Cookies:
session.description: Expire when you close your browser.

persistent.title: Persistent Cookies:
persistent.description: Stored on your device for a fixed duration. Examples:

examples.login: Login & security cookies: up to 1 year

section5.note: You can delete cookies earlier using your browser settings.

section6.title: 6. Jurisdiction-Specific Compliance
section6.intro: We comply with applicable data protection and e-privacy laws, including:

gdpr.title: GDPR (EU/EEA users)
gdpr.description: Lawful basis required before setting non-essential cookies.

ccpa.title: CCPA/CPRA (California users)
ccpa.description: Users have the right to opt out of cookie-based data sharing.

other.title: Other jurisdictions
other.description: We apply similar protections where required.

rights.adjust: You can adjust cookie preferences through your browser settings or our cookie banner/settings panel.
rights.essential: Essential cookies cannot be disabled, as they are necessary for security and core functionality.
rights.rejecting: Rejecting certain cookies (e.g., functional or analytics) may limit your experience on the platform.

section8.title: 8. Your Consent
section8.description: When you first visit the Vaulted Assets platform, a cookie banner will appear, allowing you to accept all cookies or manage your preferences. By continuing to use our platform without adjusting your browser settings, you consent to our use of cookies.

section9.title: 9. Updates to This Policy
section9.description: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology, legal requirements, or our operations. The updated policy will be posted with a new effective date.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions or concerns about our use of cookies, contact us at:

termsOfService.title: Vaulted Assets  Security & Compliance Policy
termsOfService.introduction: At Vaulted Assets, security and regulatory compliance are at the core of our operations. This policy outlines the measures we take to safeguard user assets, protect sensitive data, and ensure adherence to applicable legal and regulatory frameworks.

section1.title: 1. Purpose
section1.intro: This Security & Compliance Policy aims to:

objectives.protection: Protect user funds and data against unauthorized access, theft, or misuse.
objectives.integrity: Maintain the integrity of tokenized gold (GLD) and silver (SLV) systems.
objectives.compliance: Comply with relevant financial, data protection, and anti-money laundering regulations.

assetProtection.title: Asset Protection
assetProtection.description: Safeguarding both physical precious metals and their digital tokenized equivalents.

dataConfidentiality.title: Data Confidentiality
dataConfidentiality.description: Protecting user data from unauthorized access.

transactionIntegrity.title: Transaction Integrity
transactionIntegrity.description: Preventing fraud, tampering, and unauthorized transfers.

systemResilience.title: System Resilience
systemResilience.description: Ensuring continuous platform availability and disaster recovery.

applies.employees: All Vaulted Assets' employees, contractors, and service providers.
applies.accounts: All user accounts and transactions conducted on the Platform.
applies.assets: All physical precious metals held in custody and their corresponding digital tokens.

custodial.title: 4.1 Custodial Asset Security
custodial.description: Physical gold and silver stored in high-security vaults with 24/7 monitoring, armed security, and biometric access controls. Custodians are vetted and approved based on international security certifications. Insurance coverage for stored assets against theft, fire, and natural disasters.

blockchain.title: 4.2 Blockchain Security
blockchain.description: Tokens issued on Ethereum (ERC-20), Solana (SPL Token Program), and Canton Network (private) follow respective network standards.

features.standards: Tokens issued on Ethereum (ERC-20), Solana (SPL Token Program), and Canton Network (private) follow respective network standards.
features.audits: Smart contract code is independently audited to identify and fix vulnerabilities before deployment.
features.monitoring: Continuous on-chain monitoring for suspicious activities.

smartContracts.title: 4.3 Smart Contract Audits
smartContracts.description: All token and transaction-related smart contracts undergo independent third-party audits before deployment. Audit reports are published on the Vaulted Assets website for transparency. Post-deployment, contracts are monitored for vulnerabilities and upgraded if necessary.

features.support: Support for custodial and self-custody wallets.
features.multiSig: Multi-signature and MPC (Multi-Party Computation) protection for custodial wallets.
features.coldStorage: Cold storage for the majority of token reserves to minimize online exposure.

dataProtection.title: 4.5 Data Protection and Privacy
dataProtection.description: All user data is stored using AES-256 encryption and protected during transmission via TLS 1.3. Access to user data is role-based and logged to ensure traceability. Data minimization principles are applied: we collect only what is required to deliver our services. User rights, including access, portability, and deletion, are governed by our Privacy Policy.

userProtections.title: 4.6 User-Specific Protections
userProtections.description: Phishing and Security Education: Vaulted Assets actively educates users on risks such as phishing, malicious links, and wallet key management. Two-Factor Authentication (2FA): Strong authentication mechanisms are required for account logins and withdrawals. Session Monitoring: Users are notified of unusual logins, geographic anomalies, or suspicious account activities. Wallet Safety Tips: Guidance on cold storage, hardware wallet usage, and personal key management is provided through tutorials and FAQs.

custodyFees.title: 4.7 Custody, Fees & Redemption Security
custodyFees.description: Fee Model Safeguards: Transfer and redemption fees are monitored to prevent fraudulent or manipulative usage. Anti-Fraud Measures: Large redemption requests are subject to rate limits, velocity checks, and multi-level approval workflows to prevent abuse or coordinated attacks. Custodial Insurance: Third-party custodians are required to maintain insurance against theft, hacks, or operational failures.

regulatory.title: 5.1 Regulatory Compliance
regulatory.description: Adherence to AML (Anti-Money Laundering) and KYC (Know Your Customer) regulations. Sanctions screening against global watchlists (OFAC, UN, EU). Compliance monitoring tools for suspicious transaction detection.

audit.title: 5.2 Audit & Transparency
audit.description: Third-party audits of physical metal holdings at regular intervals (monthly/quarterly). Smart contract audits are performed by independent blockchain security firms. Publicly available audit reports on the platform.

dataCompliance.title: 5.3 Data Protection Compliance
dataCompliance.description: Compliance with GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) and CCPA (California Consumer Privacy Act). Clear user consent mechanisms for data collection and processing. User rights to access, update, or delete personal information.

certifications.title: 5.4 Certifications and Standards
certifications.intro: Vaulted Assets partners with custodians, auditors, and technology providers who maintain internationally recognized certifications:

soc.title: SOC 2 Type II
soc.description: Independent validation of internal security, availability, and confidentiality controls.

aml.title: AML/KYC Audits
aml.description: Conducted by firms such as Chainalysis for blockchain monitoring and compliance assurance.

smartContract.title: Smart Contract Security Audits
smartContract.description: Performed by independent firms such as CertiK and Trail of Bits before deployment.

section6.title: 6. Incident Response Plan
section6.intro: In case of a security breach or operational disruption:

notification.title: Notification:
notification.description: Inform affected users and regulatory authorities as required by law.

remediation.title: Remediation:
remediation.description: Apply security patches, restore services, and prevent recurrence.

measures.training: Mandatory security awareness training for employees.
measures.background: Background checks for employees in sensitive roles.
measures.vendor: Vendor due diligence to ensure third parties meet Vaulted Assets' security and compliance standards.

quarterly.title: Quarterly Physical Audits:
quarterly.description: Vault facilities undergo quarterly inspections to confirm reserve assets and storage integrity.

annual.title: Annual Financial Audits:
annual.description: Conducted by licensed third-party auditors to validate Proof of Reserves (PoR).

ongoing.title: Ongoing Blockchain Monitoring:
ongoing.description: Real-time AML/CTF transaction screening is applied to all token flows.

environmental.title: Environmental & Force Majeure Preparedness:
environmental.description: In line with our whitepaper disclaimers, contingency protocols are in place for geopolitical risks, natural disasters, or regulatory shocks that may affect vault locations.

multiRegion.title: Multi-Region Custody:
multiRegion.description: Reserve assets are geographically diversified to minimize disruption risks.

emergingRisk.title: Emerging Risk Surveillance:
emergingRisk.description: Regular assessments track risks related to new cyber threats, regulatory changes, and blockchain vulnerabilities.

security.title: Security KPIs:
security.response: Incident response time < 4 hours from detection.
security.remediation: Audit remediation within 30 days of findings.

transparency.title: Transparency Dashboard:
transparency.description: A user-facing dashboard provides real-time Proof of Reserves (PoR), audit reports, and compliance certifications, aligned with our commitment to openness.

section11.title: 11. Policy Updates
section11.description: We review and update this policy regularly to address emerging threats, regulatory changes, and technology updates.

executiveSummary.title: Executive Summary
executiveSummary.intro: Vaulted Assets is launching a secure, multi-chain digital investment platform that allows users to easily buy gold and silver online and receive equivalent digital currency in return. These digital tokens GLD for gold and SLV for silver are available on Ethereum (ERC-20 standard), Solana (SPL-20), and Canton Network to cater to a wide range of user preferences across both public and private blockchain ecosystems and represent the value of the physical precious metals users invest in.
executiveSummary.concept: The idea is simple: users invest their money to purchase gold or silver, and in return, they receive digital tokens that can be stored, gifted, used for transactions, or redeemed later. The platform brings the stability of traditional assets like gold and silver into the convenience of a digital form.
executiveSummary.tokens: When users buy gold or silver through the platform, they are issued GLD or SLV tokens   digital currencies backed 1:1 by real physical assets and built on the ERC-20, SPL-20, or Canton network standard. These tokens act as digital representations of the user's investment, combining the safety of precious metals with the flexibility of digital usage.
executiveSummary.features: Designed for both new and experienced investors, the platform offers a seamless web experience for onboarding, token management, and transactions. Users can view their holdings, make redemptions, gift tokens to others, or even participate in referral programs. To ensure security and ease of access, the platform supports multi-wallet login, hybrid Web2/Web3 infrastructure, and fiat on-ramp options. Support for the Canton Network also allows institutional privacy for enterprise users who require confidential asset handling.
executiveSummary.vision: Vaulted Assets' vision is to make investing in gold and silver as simple and usable as spending digital money   giving users true value they can hold, use, and trust.

problemStatement.title: Problem Statement
problemStatement.intro: Investing in precious metals like gold and silver has always been seen as a safe and reliable way to preserve wealth. However, the traditional process of buying, storing, and using these assets comes with several challenges:

inaccessibility.title: Inaccessibility for the average user
inaccessibility.description: Physical gold and silver often require high upfront costs, complex documentation, and secure storage solutions, making them less practical for everyday investors.

liquidity.title: Lack of liquidity and utility
liquidity.description: Once purchased, physical assets are difficult to use or transfer in day-to-day transactions. Investors cannot easily gift or spend their holdings without converting them back to cash, which can be time-consuming and costly.

transparency.title: Limited transparency and control
transparency.description: Many gold and silver investment schemes lack transparency regarding custody, pricing, and audit processes, leaving investors unsure about the safety and value of their holdings.

digitalBarriers.title: Barriers to digital adoption
digitalBarriers.description: While cryptocurrencies offer flexibility, they are often volatile and not backed by real-world value, which deters risk-averse users from adopting them.

problemStatement.conclusion: In short, there is a growing demand for an investment option that combines the stability of physical assets with the usability of digital currency   allowing people to safely invest in gold or silver and receive tokens that are easy to manage, transfer, and redeem in real time.

marketOpportunity.title: Market Opportunity
marketOpportunity.intro: Gold and silver have long been trusted as stable stores of value, especially in times of economic uncertainty. In parallel, digital payments and token-based economies are rapidly gaining global adoption. This creates a unique opportunity at the intersection of traditional investments and digital usability.

trends.title: Key market trends that support this shift:

risingDemand.title: Rising demand for gold/silver investments
risingDemand.description: In recent years, retail interest in precious metals has surged, driven by inflation fears, geopolitical uncertainty, and a desire for financial security. According to World Gold Council data, global gold demand from retail investors has remained consistently strong, with gold seen as a reliable hedge against market volatility.

digitalPayments.title: Growth in digital payment ecosystems
digitalPayments.description: Users around the world are moving away from traditional banking and looking for flexible, digital-first solutions. Digital wallets, tokenized assets, and mobile-first platforms are becoming mainstream.

platformLack.title: Lack of user-friendly gold investment platforms
platformLack.description: Most existing solutions focus either on physical ownership (with storage and access hurdles) or purely speculative gold-backed tokens, which lack everyday usability and transparency.

valueBacked.title: Shift toward value-backed digital currencies
valueBacked.description: While cryptocurrencies have opened doors for digital financial tools, their high volatility limits real-world use. There's growing interest in digital tokens that are stable, asset-backed, and practical for transactions — a gap that Vaulted Assets aims to fill.

goldSilverDemand.title: Strong Investment Appetite for Gold & Silver
goldSilverDemand.q1Data: In Q1 2025, global gold demand rose to 1,206 tonnes, a 1% year-over-year increase and the highest first-quarter total since 2016.
goldSilverDemand.investmentSurge: Investment demand alone surged by 170% YoY to 552t, driven mainly by ETF inflows and retail purchases in Asia.
goldSilverDemand.sentiment: Global sentiment toward gold remains strong: prices have climbed ~29% in 2025, trading near $3,398/oz, greatly outperforming equity indices such as the S&P 500 (~8.1%)
goldSilverDemand.silverDemand: In 2025, Silver demand (~1.148 bn oz) is expected to exceed supply (~1.031 bn oz) by approximately 117.6 million ounces.

trendsTable.risingDemandRelevance: Users want gold/silver exposure in easy, divisible formats
trendsTable.digitalPaymentsRelevance: Consumers expect seamless digital access and usage
trendsTable.assetTokenizationRelevance: Validates market potential for tokens backed by real assets

marketOpportunity.conclusion: By offering a platform that allows users to invest in gold or silver and receive usable digital currency in return, Vaulted Assets is tapping into two strong and growing markets: the enduring demand for precious metals and the accelerating shift toward digital financial tools. This positions the platform as a reliable, secure, and future-ready solution for both traditional investors and digitally savvy users.

proposedSolution.title: Proposed Solution
proposedSolution.intro: Vaulted Assets presents a modern, secure, and accessible solution that allows individuals to invest in physical gold and silver   and receive equivalent digital currency tokens (GLD and SLV) in return. These tokens, built on the ERC-20, SPL-20, or Canton network standard, can be held, used, gifted, or redeemed by users at any time through a clean, intuitive platform interface.

backedTokens.title: Gold and Silver-Backed Digital Tokens
backedTokens.description: Users invest in real, fully backed physical gold or silver. In return, they receive GLD or SLV tokens that represent their holdings. These tokens are usable like digital currency   they can be transferred, gifted, or redeemed, making them more functional than traditional gold/silver investments.

platform.title: Easy-to-Use Investor Platform
platform.description: A user-friendly web-based platform for onboarding, KYC, investing, and transaction management. Investors can view balances, track transaction history, redeem tokens, and send GLD/SLV to others. Gifting features and referral incentives are integrated to drive platform engagement.

walletSupport.title: Hybrid Wallet Support
walletSupport.description: Users can access their tokens through secure custodial wallets. The hybrid setup supports both Web2 (email/password) and Web3 (wallet connect) users. Custodial wallet integration ensures institutional-grade custody and security for all transactions.

digitalExperience.title: Branded Digital Experience
digitalExperience.description: The platform will be deployed as a fully branded web application, with customizable identity and token visuals. Supports multi-wallet login and third-party fiat on-ramp services for quick fund transfers and conversions.

adminDashboard.title: Powerful Admin Dashboard
adminDashboard.description: A backend system for Vaulted Assets to manage token minting and burning based on gold/silver reserves. Real-time oversight of AML compliance, user activity, and gifting thresholds. Built-in analytics to monitor platform usage, growth, and referral performance.

cantonNetwork.title: Institutional Privacy Layer- Canton Network
cantonNetwork.description: For enterprise or high-net-worth users, the Canton Network integration will offer private transaction layers. Ensures transaction confidentiality and regulatory flexibility for institutional investors.

proposedSolution.conclusion: By combining the trust and value of physical precious metals with the convenience and usability of digital finance, Vaulted Assets provides a future-ready investment platform that appeals to both traditional investors and modern digital users.

custodyFramework.title: Underlying Gold/Silver Custody Framework
custodyFramework.intro: The trustworthiness of the Vaulted Assets platform relies heavily on the strength and transparency of its gold and silver custody system. To ensure that every GLD or SLV token is securely backed by real-world assets, the platform has established a well-defined and audit-ready custody framework.

assetType.label: Asset Type
assetType.description: Physical investment-grade gold and silver (e.g., 999 purity bars or coins)

storagePartners.label: Storage Partners
storagePartners.description: Vaulted Assets partners with certified and insured third-party vaulting providers to store the precious metals in secure facilities

geographic.label: Geographic Distribution
geographic.description: Vaults are strategically located in compliant jurisdictions to ensure international access and regulatory reliability

guarantee.title: 1:1 Asset-Backed Guarantee
guarantee.description: Each GLD or SLV token in circulation is fully backed by an equivalent amount of physical gold or silver held in custody. New tokens are minted only when actual metal deposits are confirmed; redemptions result in corresponding token burns.

audits.title: Third-Party Audits & Transparency
audits.description: Independent auditors verify the quantity and quality of the stored gold and silver at regular intervals. Smart contract audits are conducted by reputed blockchain security firms to ensure token issuance, redemption, and custody mechanisms are safe, accurate, and tamper-proof.

tracking.title: Real-Time Reserve Tracking
tracking.description: Users can view token supply versus reserve holdings in real time via on-chain dashboards. A public Proof-of-Reserve mechanism ensures that token issuance never exceeds available vault holdings.

logistics.title: Secure Logistics & Insurance
logistics.description: All stored assets are insured against theft, loss, and damage through globally recognized underwriters. Logistics for redemption follow strict chain-of-custody and KYC-compliant procedures.

platformArchitecture.title: Platform Architecture
platformArchitecture.intro: This is the tech stack behind the platform. Smart contracts manage minting, burning, pricing, and security. The web portal will be user-friendly and mobile-compatible. The admin dashboard gives full control to manage users, tokens, redemptions, and compliance. The Canton Network can be used for institutional-grade privacy and control.
platformArchitecture.overview: Here's a complete overview of platform architecture:

smartContracts.title: 1. Smart Contracts & Token Logic
smartContracts.description: Core platform functions like minting, burning, redemption, and price calculation are handled through secure smart contracts, ensuring transparency and minimizing human intervention.

userDashboard.title: 2. User Dashboard
userDashboard.description: A responsive and intuitive dashboard allows users to register, buy tokens, track holdings in real-time, refer others, and initiate redemptions.

hybridWallet.title: 3. Hybrid Wallet Infrastructure
hybridWallet.description: Supporting both custodial and self-custody options, the platform accommodates users who prefer simple Web2-style access alongside those who want full Web3 control.

multiChain.title: 4. Multi-Chain Support
multiChain.description: Built to operate across Ethereum, Solana, and Canton networks, ensuring users can choose their preferred blockchain environment.

adminControls.title: 5. Admin Controls & Compliance
adminControls.description: Backend tools for managing token supply, monitoring transactions, enforcing AML/KYC requirements, and maintaining reserve ratios.

security.title: 6. Security & Auditing
security.description: Multi-layer security protocols, regular smart contract audits, and continuous monitoring to protect user assets and platform integrity.

cta.description: Experience the perfect combination of traditional asset security and modern digital convenience with Vaulted Assets.

introduction.text1: Vaulted Assets ("we," "our," "us") is committed to protecting your personal information and respecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and share your data when you use our platform, including our web and mobile applications, to purchase, hold, transfer, and redeem tokenized gold and silver.
introduction.text2: By using Vaulted Assets, you agree to the practices described in this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.intro: We collect the following categories of information:

personal.title: Personal Information:
personal.description: Name, email, phone number, and identification documents (for KYC/AML compliance).

financial.title: Financial Information:
financial.description: Payment method details, transaction records, and wallet addresses.

blockchain.title: Blockchain Data:
blockchain.description: Public wallet addresses, transaction hashes, and balances on Ethereum, Solana, and other supported blockchains. While this data is public and pseudonymous, users should be aware that advanced analytics may allow de-anonymization.

institutional.title: Institutional Privacy (Canton Network):
institutional.description: For institutional users leveraging Canton, enhanced privacy measures apply, ensuring that transaction data is not globally broadcast and remains accessible only to authorized parties.

technical.title: Technical Data:
technical.description: IP addresses, device information, browser type, and cookies (see our Cookie Policy).

usage.title: Usage Analytics:
usage.description: Clickstream data, platform usage patterns, referral codes, and aggregated behavior for service improvement.

uses.provide: Provide platform services and execute transactions.
uses.verify: Verify identities and comply with KYC/AML regulations.
uses.improve: Improve, customize, and secure the platform.
uses.enable: Enable fiat on/off-ramp functionality and cross-chain transfers.
uses.support: Provide customer support and respond to inquiries.

section3.title: 3. Legal Basis for Processing
section3.intro: We process personal data under one or more of the following legal bases:

contract.title: Performance of a Contract
contract.description: To fulfill our obligations to you.

legal.title: Legal Obligation
legal.description: To comply with laws and regulations.

legitimate.title: Legitimate Interests
legitimate.description: To operate and improve our platform securely.

consent.title: Consent
consent.description: Where you have explicitly agreed (e.g., for marketing).

section4.title: 4. Data Sharing and Third-Party Integrations
section4.intro: We may share your information in the following cases:

blockchain.title: Blockchain Networks:
blockchain.description: Transactions submitted to blockchains are publicly visible and immutable. We cannot control how third parties analyze this data.

fiat.title: Fiat On-Ramps / Payment Providers:
fiat.description: To process deposits/withdrawals, relevant personal and financial data may be shared securely with licensed providers.

wallets.title: Third-Party Wallets & Bridges:
wallets.description: If you use external wallets or cross-chain services, certain identifiers (e.g., wallet address, transaction metadata) may be shared for transaction execution.

analytics.title: Analytics Providers:
analytics.description: Aggregated and anonymized usage data may be shared for platform improvement.

legal.title: Legal/Regulatory Requests:
legal.description: We may disclose data to comply with applicable laws, regulators, or law enforcement.

section4.noSale: We do not sell your personal information.

encryption.title: Encryption:
encryption.description: All sensitive data is encrypted at rest (AES-256) and in transit (TLS 1.3).

backups.title: Backups:
backups.description: Geographically distributed encrypted backups for disaster recovery.

physical.title: Physical Security:
physical.description: Custodian vaults comply with industry-leading safety standards.

section6.title: 6. Data Security and Breach Notification
section6.protocols: We apply strong security protocols including AES-256 encryption, Multi-Sig wallets, cold storage, and regular audits.
section6.breachIntro: In the event of a data breach involving personal data:

breachSteps.users: Affected users will be notified within 72 hours, in compliance with GDPR and other regulatory frameworks.
breachSteps.authorities: Relevant authorities will also be informed as required.

section7.title: 7. Cookies, Tracking, and Opt-Outs
section7.intro: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies as described in our Cookie Policy. These include:

essential.title: Essential Cookies:
essential.description: Required for platform security and login functionality.

performance.title: Performance Analytics:
performance.description: Track usage trends to improve services.

referral.title: Referral & Marketing Tags:
referral.description: Non-essential cookies for campaign performance and referral tracking.

optOut.title: Opt-Out:
optOut.description: You may disable non-essential cookies via your account settings or through your browser preferences. Certain features may not function if cookies are disabled.

section8.title: 8. Children's Privacy and Sensitive Data
section8.children: Our platform is intended only for users aged 18 and above. We do not knowingly collect data from children under 18. If we become aware that a minor has submitted data, we will delete it immediately.
section8.sensitive: Sensitive data, including biometric information for KYC purposes, is stored securely and processed only by approved third-party providers under strict compliance requirements.

section9.title: 9. International Data Transfers
section9.description: Your data may be transferred to and processed in jurisdictions outside your home country, including locations where data protection laws may differ. We ensure adequate protection through contractual safeguards or other lawful mechanisms.

periods.account: For as long as you maintain an account with us.
periods.regulations: For a minimum period required under financial regulations (typically 57 years).
periods.legal: Longer if necessary for legal, audit, or dispute resolution purposes.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Vaulted Assets

q1.question: What is Vaulted Assets?
q1.answer: Vaulted Assets is a platform that allows you to buy, hold, transfer, and redeem gold- and silver-backed digital tokens. Each token represents direct ownership of fully allocated precious metals stored in secure vaults.

q2.question: How is this different from buying gold or silver physically?
q2.answer: When you buy tokens through Vaulted Assets, you own real gold or silver stored in professional-grade vaults   but you can manage your holdings digitally, trade them instantly, and redeem them anytime.

q3.question: Where are the metals stored?
q3.answer: All gold and silver are stored with approved custodians in high-security vaults located in regulated jurisdictions.

q4.question: Are my holdings insured?
q4.answer: Yes, all vaulted assets are covered by comprehensive insurance policies provided by the custodians.

q5.question: Which blockchains do you use?
q5.answer: Vaulted Assets supports both public blockchains (e.g., Solana, Ethereum) and private/permissioned blockchains (e.g., Canton) to meet different user needs.

q6.question: Can I choose which blockchain my tokens are on?
q6.answer: Yes   you can select your preferred network when purchasing or transferring tokens.

q7.question: Are blockchain transactions reversible?
q7.answer: No. Once a blockchain transaction is confirmed, it cannot be undone. Always double-check transaction details before confirming.

q8.question: How can I buy tokens?
q8.answer: You can purchase tokens using supported fiat currencies or cryptocurrencies directly through our web or mobile app.

q9.question: Can I redeem my tokens for physical gold or silver?
q9.answer: Yes. You can request redemption in the form of physical metals (subject to minimum amounts) or equivalent fiat value.

q10.question: How long does redemption take?
q10.answer: Delivery timelines depend on your location, availability, and the selected method (physical delivery or cash settlement).

q11.question: What fees apply?
q11.answer: We charge fees for transactions, storage, and blockchain transfers. Fees vary depending on whether you use a public or private blockchain.

q12.question: Are transfers between Vaulted Assets users free?
q12.answer: Transfers on private blockchains may have reduced or zero fees. Transfers on public blockchains may incur network gas fees.

q13.question: How is my account secured?
q13.answer: We use strong encryption, two-factor authentication (2FA), and multiple security layers for both wallets and platform access.

q14.question: Do I need to verify my identity?
q14.answer: Yes   all users must complete AML/KYC verification to comply with global regulations.

q15.question: What happens if Vaulted Assets shuts down?
q15.answer: Your metals remain your property. In the event of platform closure, you will be able to redeem your holdings or transfer them to an alternative custodian.

q16.question: Can I move my tokens between Ethereum, Solana, and Canton?
q16.answer: Yes. We support cross-chain transfers through trusted bridges and in some cases via separate issuance models (where a token can be redeemed on one chain and reissued on another). Our documentation explains the specific process for GLD and SLV.

q17.question: Will bridging affect my ownership of the tokens?
q17.answer: No. Whether you hold GLD on Ethereum or Solana, each token is fully backed 1:1 by physical reserves in our vaults.

q18.question: How do I know tokens are fully backed by gold and silver reserves?
q18.answer: Vaulted Assets maintains Proof-of-Reserves with regular third-party audits. We also publish a live dashboard showing token supply against audited vault holdings, so users can verify backing at any time.

q19.question: Who conducts the audits?
q19.answer: Independent, accredited auditing firms conduct our reserve verifications to ensure transparency and trust.

q20.question: Do I need a crypto wallet to use Vaulted Assets?
q20.answer: Not necessarily. Our hybrid wallet system allows you to choose between: Custodial wallets (simple, Web2-style login, no technical knowledge needed). Self-custody wallets (e.g., MetaMask, Phantom, or Canton-compatible solutions).

q21.question: Can I use my existing wallet?
q21.answer: Yes, you can connect your own Web3 wallet to manage your GLD and SLV tokens if you prefer self-custody.

q22.question: Can I gift tokens to someone else?
q22.answer: Yes. Our platform enables token gifting, so you can send gold or silver to family and friends directly.

q23.question: Do you offer referral incentives?
q23.answer: Yes. Vaulted Assets runs referral programs where existing users can invite others and earn rewards in tokens. Details are available in your account dashboard.

q24.question: Can I use Vaulted Assets in my country?
q24.answer: Our services are subject to local laws and regulations. Some jurisdictions may restrict or prohibit participation in digital asset platforms. Please review our Terms of Use and consult your local regulations before investing.

q25.question: Is the platform available to U.S. or EU users?
q25.answer: Availability varies by product. Certain features may be restricted based on compliance requirements. We will notify users during onboarding if access is limited.
